title: Bug 112458: Property Editor shows properties of layout items when switching to Master page viewer
description:
Description: When switching to the Master page viewer, the Property Editor still shows the properties of layout items. This can be confusing for customers who may mistake it for the Master Page Editor and inadvertently set properties without clicking on the Master Page viewer first.

Steps to reproduce:
1. [Please specify the steps here.]
OB: It is important to fix this issue to prevent confusion for customers. The Property Editor should not display the properties of layout items when in the Master page viewer mode. Instead, it should only show the properties relevant to the Master page.
EB: The Property Editor should not display the properties of layout items when in the Master page viewer mode. It should only show the properties relevant to the Master page.
SR:
1. When switching to the Master page viewer, the Property Editor should not display the properties of layout items.
2. The Property Editor should only show the properties relevant to the Master page.
